segments.text: Excuse me . When is breakfast time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I would like to order breakfast for tomorrow coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , Sir . What would you like to have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please give me two fried eggs , two orders of toast and a cup of coffee .
segments.speaker: S1
